description: [INC Ransom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1032) has used AnyDesk and PuTTY on compromised systems.(Citation: Huntress INC Ransom Group August 2023)(Citation: SOCRadar INC Ransom January 2024)(Citation: Huntress INC Ransomware May 2024)(Citation: SentinelOne INC Ransomware)

SentinelOne. (n.d.). What Is Inc. Ransomware?. Retrieved June 5, 2024.
